Text: Iko le̩ o̩ga fʼAbija, o̩ma Je̩ro̩boam, mu.

Taku Je̩ro̩boam ka ñw o̩ya-wñ kakini, Nagbo̩ko̩bʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ fʼafe̩ kpanyi, kʼama ki we ema ka kʼuwe̩ chʼo̩ya Je̩ro̩boam; kʼe̩ nyi Shailo; go, o̩mo̩ le̩ Ahija, akache̩ de̩, e-kʼi ka ñwu mi ka kʼomi ajʼonu amone̩-i.
E̩ la mʼeli o̩je̩ me̩gwa ko lebʼuwe̩ kpai akala kpai o̩cha iño̩, kʼe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ; owñ le̩ aka ñw e̩ alu kʼejo̩gba o̩ma-i ade̩.
Oñ o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam fʼabe̩le̩ che. I kwane̩, i letu Shailo, oñ i lewa unyi Ahija. Ahija laño̩ gane̩ ge̩ n, eju-wñ gbe̩ mʼakpo todu i chʼogijo.
Jihofa la ka ñw Ahija kakini, Go, o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam awa kʼi tene ugbo we̩ alu kʼo̩la o̩ma-wñ ade̩; todu i acho̩ga. Abe̩i, abe̩i uwe̩ aka ñw u.

Abe̩le̩ i la de, e̩gba kʼAhija ebo̩ e̩re̩ ane̩-wñ, abu kʼi agudu wʼalugbo̩na, i kakini, Mugudu wa, uwe̩ o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam. E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ chʼakpaine dabe̩ne̩ kʼe̩ chʼe̩ne̩ omune̩? Todu ma dʼinabali ki woji kpe̩ mi uche̩ rʼuwe̩.
Lo, kʼe̩ ka ñwu Je̩ro̩boam kakini, Abu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l, ka de̩ kakini, Todabu kʼu dʼuwe̩ kwef amone̩ le̩ dago, kʼu la dʼuwe̩ chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l,

kʼu la fʼojane̩ le̩ ge̩ bʼabo unyi Defid te̩, kʼu mʼu du ñw e̩; uwe̩ la muda dab alu kʼadu-mi Defid de̩ n, kʼowñ le̩ fʼuko̩ uko̩-mi de, oñ i tʼumi ubi kpʼe̩do̩-wñ chaka, e̩wñ ki chʼo̩kpakpa eju-mi kate i nache.
Uwe̩ muda fʼe̩bie̩ne̩ che tʼabo du ku ma wa o̩gba-we̩ le, e̩ la le tekeche amo̩jo̩ omune̩ ñw o̩la-we̩, kpai ojibo eda, kʼe̩ bi mi eju, e̩ la mʼumi du rikpolo tʼubi-we̩.

Todule̩ go, omi akʼe̩bie̩ne̩ wa abʼunyi Je̩ro̩boam ma, oñ nakʼaboke̩le̩ okoke du da bi Je̩ro̩boam o̩wo̩ te̩, tʼo̩to̩ tʼohi, omi la agbʼunyi Je̩ro̩boam rinyo̩ hioko, alu kʼone̩ agbʼechu rinyo̩ gbogbo tak i takpa chaka.
E̩ne̩ Je̩ro̩boam kʼi leku ef ewo amabia amʼu du je̩; oñ e̩ne̩ kʼi leku o̩ko̩ ame̩we̩ ojale amʼu du je̩. Todu Jihofa fʼe-le̩ ka me̩.
Todule̩ e̩ kwane̩, kʼe̩ nyʼunyi-we̩. E̩gba kʼe̩ mʼe̩re̩-we̩ dʼatʼewo le̩, o̩ma-i aku.
Oñ abo Israe̩l chaka adʼaido̩-wñ, ma la adʼu ji. Todu owñ kate chʼe̩ne̩ Je̩ro̩boam ki atʼef oji; todu ma fʼe̩wñʼka ki chenyo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩ e-Israe̩l eju, li ef uwñ, ef unyi Je̩ro̩boam.
Jihofa la adʼonu ki anʼo̩da abo Israe̩l kwane̩ ñw o̩la-wñ kʼi akʼabo unyi Je̩roboam da rinyo̩ o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i. E̩wñ le̩? i chaka chʼifa-ifa?

Todu Jihofa agwo abo Israe̩l alu kʼomi ohimini ami elikpo ejo, i la agu abo Israe̩l du rinyo̩ bʼojane̩ ki nyo̩ kʼi du ñw amata-ma te̩, oñ i akpa ma tuka rʼej udaba ohimini todabu ku ma fʼAshe̩rim-ma che ku ma bi Jihofa eju.
I la atʼabo Israe̩l no̩ tinyo̩ tod adure adure Je̩ro̩boam, owñ chʼe-kʼowñ onugo che kpai e-kʼi ño̩ je ñw abo Israe̩l che ge̩.
Tak o̩ya Je̩ro̩boam kwane̩, oñ i kwʼo̩mo̩ le. I lewa Tirza, oñ abu kʼi lewa kado ubo̩ alugbo̩na unyi le̩, o̩ma-i mʼiñmi da.
Tak abo Israe̩l chaka mʼu du ji, oñ ma dʼaido̩-wñ, teju o̩la Jihofa kʼi ka lʼalu adu-wñ, Ahija, akache̩ le̩.
O̩la Je̩ro̩boam ki bo̩, alu kʼi jʼogu kpai alu kʼi jʼonu, go, inabali-wñ che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l.
Je̩roboam la jʼonu o̩do̩ ogu nyoke meji, tak i cholu manyʼamata-wñ. Oñ Nedab, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.

Rehoboam, o̩ma So̩lo̩mo̩n, la jʼonu-wñ Juda. O̩do̩ Reho̩boam la chʼo̩gbo̩ meji nyokeʼka tak i chane̩ onu-wñ eje̩. Oñ i jʼonu o̩do̩ me̩gwe̩bie Je̩rusale̩m kʼi chʼewo ki Jihofa du kwef o̩lo̩pu o̩lo̩pu Israe̩l chaka kʼi dʼodu-wñ tʼo̩mo̩. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Naama, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n.
Juda la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa. Oñ ma nʼe̩wñ adure ku ma jʼache nyʼowñ ogu eja tʼe̩wñ du kʼamata-ma che le.
Todu ama ño̩ ko otete otete ñw o̩la-ma, kpai ode ode, kpai Ashe̩rim, oj uwo du ki gbo̩gba, kpai of oli emimi du.
Amache̩wñtuñ ef unyi ode-ma ño̩ jʼane̩ o̩mo̩. Ma jo̩ ache teju e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩ abo uche̩ichi e-ki Jihofa ne bʼeju abo Israe̩l te̩ le̩.
Oñ i lewatu o̩do̩ e̩ke̩lu ku Reho̩boam jʼonu, Shishak, onu Ijipti, lewa kobo̩ Je̩rusale̩m;
oñ i mʼe̩wñ akoko ño̩ bʼunyi Jihofa kpai unyi onu te̩. I mʼe̩wñ du ño̩ le. I ño̩ mʼugbe̩yo̩ o̩jamalia du ki So̩lo̩mo̩n che le̩ ko ge̩.
Taku Reho̩boam fʼugbe̩yo̩ ebije-ikpa che koji-wñ oñ i mʼu ko nyʼamagboji abide o̩wo̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma de alugbo̩na unyi onu.
Oñ ab i de̩ de: e̩gba du kʼonu nyʼef unyi Jihofa abo ide anʼugbe̩yo̩ le̩ le̩; taku ma mʼu ko dabi wa unyi ide ge̩.
O̩la Rehoboam ki bo̩ kpai e̩wñ du kʼi che, i che̩ko̩ tʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Juda le̩ n?
Ogu la dago agbagba Reho̩boam kpai Je̩ro̩boam o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Taku Reho̩boam cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji ugbo amata-wñ ef ewo Defid. Odu iye-wñ la ko̩ Naama, e̩ne̩ Amo̩n le̩. Tak Abijam, o̩ma-wñ, jʼonu koji-wñ.
